name: @mitre/saf
description: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) Command Line Interface (CLI) brings together applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the security community to streamline security automation for systems and DevOps pipelines
author: The MITRE Security Automation Framework

warn-if-update-available.message: <%= config.name %> update available from <%= chalk.greenBright(config.version) %> to <%= chalk.greenBright(latest) %>.

convert.description: [Normalize]    Convert security results from all your security tools between common data formats

harden.description: [Harden]       Implement security baselines using Ansible, Chef, and Terraform content: Visit https://saf.mitre.org/#/harden to explore and run hardening scripts

scan.description: [Validate]     Scan to get detailed security testing results: Visit https://saf.mitre.org/#/validate to explore and run inspec profiles

view.description: [Visualize]    Identify overall security status and deep-dive to solve specific security defects

scripts.prepack: rm -rf lib && tsc -b && oclif-dev manifest && oclif-dev readme
